text: Mariyama mhanali, ‘‘he majhya palanakartya! Mala mulaga kasa bare ho'ila? Vastavika mala adyapa kona purusane sparsahi kelela nahi.’’ Phariste mhanale, ‘‘asa prakare allaha je icchito nirmana karato. Allaha jevha ekhade karya karu icchito tevha phakta evadheca mhanato- ‘ho'una ja’ ani te ghaduna yete.’’
